name: Deep Space Rotations
description:
A 2D top-down-shooter similar to Asteroids, featuring special events.

The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible. It is highly encouraged to share the game with friends so you can compete with them and crown the better gamer.

GLHF!
And thanks for playing <3

Credits

  • Laser sound was created by dklon via OpenGameArt.org
  • Some assets were created by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl)
  • Mouse Icon - Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Some of the sounds in this project were created by David McKee (ViRiX) soundcloud.com/virix
  • Music - Jellyfish in Space by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3938-jellyfish-in-space
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Heal Sound - Created by DoKashiteru via OpenGameArt.org
  • Hurt Sound - Created by remaxim via OpenGameArt.org

Made with love by Jekplex.
